title.title: VW cuts number of cars hit by CO2 errors

editorial.subheading: Group says emissions issue affects 36,000 vehicles, not 800,000
editorial.standFirst: Carmaker now says this emissions issue affects 36,000 vehicles, not 800,000
editorial.byline: Richard Milne in Wolfsburg and David Oakley in London

images.alt: A Volkswagen Passat CC car is tested for its exhaust emissions, at a MOT (Ministry of Transport) testing station in Walthamstow, London, as the software used in Volkswagen's diesel cars to trick emissions testers in the US was also built into its European vehicles, according to Germany's transport minister.
images.caption: A VW Passat undergoes an emissions test in London
